answers.answer: This looks okay overall - would retest TSH and T4 in 3 months to determine pattern.  In many labs, the TSH range is 0.3-3.0.

question: I am a 42 year old, 6'2", 225 pounds, type 2 diabetes, genetic high triglycerides--285 with meds, high ast/alt. I recently had a tsh and free t4 test. The TSH was .32, and free t4 1.4. My sister has hyperthroidism, and my dad has hypothroidism. I am on metformin, glymepiride, lisinopril, attenolol, allegra,What would people thinks as far as the concern for thyroid issues?
title: Thyroid Concern or not?
